subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: The story of O.J. Mayo, a top high school prospect who was thrown out of a basketball game on Friday, has blown up thanks to a video of the incident and the curious circumstances surrounding his ejection.
snippet: The story of O.J. Mayo, a top high school prospect who was thrown out of a basketball game on Friday, has blown up thanks to a video of the incident and the curious circumstances surrounding his ejection.
